title: Regulating The Crypto Economy
description: How should Washington treat the $2 trillion crypto industry? Barron's crypto and finance editor Daren Fonda discusses the issues with SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce, dubbed the "crypto mom."
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: How should Washington treat the $2 trillion crypto industry? Barron's crypto and finance editor Daren Fonda discusses the issues with SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce, dubbed the "crypto mom."
